Title: Fishing for a Bruising
Description:
The riverblade saurok clan is attacking one of our local fishing expeditions!  They need help right away!

Thin those saurok out and help that expedition return safely!
ObjectivesText: Kill 8 Riverblade Beach Raiders at Anglers Expedition, just west of Anglers Wharf.
PortraitGiverText: Fierce jungle fighters, the Saurok are not to be trifled with.
